properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rumors of the Son of man Stories of a Savior Holiness with human hands Treasure for the traitor{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}No ear had heard no eye had seen The image of the Father Until heaven came to live with me A rescue like no other{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You are worthy You are worthy of Your name You are worthy You are worthy of Your name Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You did not speak You made no sound You died for your accusers As Your blood fell on the ground You redefined my future{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And on the day that you arose The darkness ran for cover For the King of kings Has claimed His throne Now until forever{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You are worthy You are worthy of Your name You are worthy You are worthy of Your name Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You’re my author, my maker My ransom, my savior My refuge, my hiding place You’re my helper, my healer My blessed redeemer My answer, my saving grace{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You’re my hope in the shadows My strength in the battle My anchor for all my days You stand by my side And You stood in my place Jesus no other name Jesus no other name{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You are worthy You are worthy of Your name You are worthy You are worthy of Your name Jesus{/lang-eng}
